name: Pokémon Echo Emerald
overview: Overview: This is a rom hack of Pokemon Emerald. The highlights of Echo Emerald are the many quality of life enhancements, wild encounter reworks, ability to 100% complete the gen 3 national dex and reworked gym leaders & elite 4 to be significantly challenging in vanilla gameplay. I hope you enjoy! Note to players: • I highly recommend playing with Set battle style to remain on an even playing field as notable trainers. This can be found in Settings. • I recommend going in blind before referring to the Guides. • Feel free to share with me your experience or any bugs you may encounter! on Discord: DrCraig#2084 Features & Changes: • Enhancements • Running shoes enabled indoors • Black & White repel system • Fire Red fishing system • Pokemon stats colored relative to nature • Red +10% • Blue -10% Pokedex & Pokemon: • National pokedex received at start • Impossible evolutions made possible • Wild encounters reworked • Every route adjusted • 100% completable pokedex Items: • Bag items disabled in battle • TMs are unsellable • TMs are reusable • HMs can be deleted/forgotten • Lilycove sells all 6 evo stones (3F) • Vitamin price reduction • Rare candy sold at Battle Frontier • Lucky Egg sold at Battle Frontier Battling & Trainers: • Gen 3 mechanics • Gym leaders and Elite 4 difficult teams • Emphasis on team changes, not level increases. • Gym leaders and Elite 4 potions removed • Gym leader rematches reworked • 5th rematch Pokémon changed to lvl 100 • Miscellaneous notable trainers buffed
